name: Hello World!
body:
Welcome,
My name is Gavin and everyday I am striving to learn new and great things. As of now, I am an entry level programmer who mostly uses PHP and HTML. I like to believe I have unique and useful ideas that could accomplish wonderful things. I'm willing to collaborate with other great thinkers and reach the best solution possible. I'm interested in many project types such as social media, video games, app creation, etc.)

If you have any questions or opportunities you may contact me at gavinblake255@gmail.com

When Henry Ford made cheap, reliable cars people said, 'Nah, what's wrong with a horse?' That was a huge bet he made, and it worked. ~Elon Musk
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
